synopsis.text:
During the tumultuous era of the crusades in 1212 AD, an innocent soldier is betrayed and takes his own life, swearing to return as a vengeful spirit. True to his word, he is reincarnated as a formidable female warrior named Aiko in the present day. As the military leader of a new crusade, Aiko unifies the world and eradicates all religion, leaving an indelible mark on history.

But her triumph is marred by haunting memories of a past life, prompting her to journey back in time. As she delves deeper into the enigma of her past, Aiko finds herself embroiled in a breathtaking battle to safeguard the future. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, Aiko must confront her past and harness her inner strength to emerge victorious in this epic struggle.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
